name: 涂淑惠
objective: 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：1.電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，2.電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，3.一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，4.穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，5.電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。
schedule:
Week1: Characteristics of resistors, capacitors, and inductors
Week2: Loop analysis (mesh-current analysis); nodal analysis (node-voltage analysis)
Week3: Duality
Week4: Thevenin theorem and Norton theorem
Week5: Delta-Wye transformation; star-to-network transformation
Week6: Symmetric Circuits; skew-symmetric circuits
Week7: Test 1
Week8: Reciprocity Theorem
Week9: Midterm
Week10: Two-port parameters of resistive networks
Week11: Electric power
Week12: Mutual inductance
Week13: Controlled source
Week14: Test 2
Week15: First-order circuits
Week16: Second-order circuits 
Week17: Time-domain analysis
Week18: Final
materials:
1. Electric Circuits (10th edition) by James W. Nilsson and Susan A. Riedel
2. Fundamentals of Electric Circuits (6th edition) by Christopher. K. Alexander and Matthew N.O. Sadiku
